29584.summary: Some customers in Jameswood and surrounding areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29584.title: Nov 24 – Winnipeg (Jameswood) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Technicians have restored services to most of the area and continue to work to resolve this issue.
